apps.name: FootnodeFinder
apps.subtitle: An advanced footnote maker for your device, with many customizable features.
apps.localizedDescription: FootnoteFinder allows you to add a footnote to your device, with customizable aspects, such as color, potion, and custom texts. Might not work on iOS 16.1.2 and under.

apps.name: Pigeon
apps.subtitle: Jailed Port of The Dodo Jailbreak Tweak
apps.localizedDescription: Jailed Port of The Dodo Jailbreak Tweak. Move clock and items , change wallpaper, and more!

apps.localizedDescription: Setup wallpaper, alignment, etc for Pigeon.
